author: wn.com
title: Celebrate the Life of Paul Robeson: Athlete, Actor, Activist (Stevens Institute of Technology)
text: ( Source : Stevens Institute of Technology ) The Samuel C. Williams Library and College of Arts & Letters invite you to join us to celebrate the life of Paul Robeson on Monday, October 26 , at 4 p.m. in the Great Hall of the Library. Join
